Properties.Description: List of clothing items to be worn in the preview image.

Types.DisplayName: Known Physics Material Audio Def ID

Values.Description: Sound played when a bullet hits a surface with this physics material.
Sound played when a vehicle, bayonet, trap, or punch hits a surface with this physics material. Falls back to 'MeleeImpact'.
Sound played when a melee weapon hits a surface with this physics material. Falls back to 'LegacyImpact'.
Footstep sound played when an entity runs on a surface with this physics material.
Footstep sound played when an entity walks on a surface with this physics material.
Footstep sound played when a two-legged entity lands on a surface with this physics material after falling.
Footstep sound played when a mega zombie walks on a surface with this physics material.
Footstep sound played when a zombie walks on a surface with this physics material. Falls back to 'FootstepWalk'.
Footstep sound played when a zombie runs on a surface with this physics material. Falls back to 'FootstepRun'.
Footstep sound played when a mega zombie lands on a surface with this physics material after falling. Falls back to 'BipedLand'.
Footstep sound played when a zombie lands on a surface with this physics material after falling. Falls back to 'BipedLand'.
